Description: Dish. Stems of stylised roses,cloud clips and scaly pomegranates rising from leafy tuft. Made of black, grey-green, turquoise, manganese, cobalt painted and glazed ceramic, pottery.
Bibliographic references: Lane 1957 / Later Islamic Pottery: Persia, Syria, Egypt, Turkey (fig.35.B)
Godman 1901 / The Godman collection of Oriental and Spanish pottery and glass, 1865-1900 (424)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Frederick Du Cane Godman
